title: ICE: `index out of bounds: the len is 2 but the index is 6'`  snapshot_vec

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust pub struct A; impl A { fn constant_not() { match () { _ => match Self::partial_cmp() {}, } } } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.71.0-nightly (699a862a3 2023-05-12) binary: rustc commit-hash: 699a862a3d4e4a2d5603c93297c0c44021ea72f5 commit-date: 2023-05-12 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.71.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.2 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
